root_explorer.title: Path of the Explorer
root_explorer.description:
§8You don't need to fight enemies if they can't catch up to you. Follow this path to train your stamina, agility, and luck to their very limits!

§aGet experience in this tree by finding and opening chests

luck.title: Lucky
luck.description:
§8You must be a punk because you're feeling lucky.

§a+0.25 Luck

scavenger.title: Scavenger
scavenger.description:
§8It's a good thing you grew up watching those survivalist youtube videos.

§a+10% Stamina Efficiency

sprint1.title: Sunday Sprinter
sprint1.description:
§8There are worse things for your health than sprinting once a week.

§a+3% Sprint Speed

sprint2.title: Monday Marathoner
sprint2.description:
§8How else would you start a great week than with your favourite activity.

§a+10% Movement Speed

long-arms.title: Long Armed
long-arms.description:
§8These freakishly long arms would've been useful to defuse the bomb an hour ago.

§a+1 Reach

loot-magnet.title: Loot Magnet
loot-magnet.description:
§8Items on the floor seem to be drawn to your body and you're not entirely sure why, but your back thanks you.

§a+1 Collection Range

aquaman.title: Aquaman
aquaman.description:
§8You move underwater like a dolphin.

§a+20% Movement Speed in Water

lavaman.title: Lavaman
lavaman.description:
§8You move underlava like a... like a... 

§8You move faster in lava.

§a+20% Movement Speed in Lava

deep-breaths.title: Water Breather
deep-breaths.description:
§8You can breathe underwater!

§8Okay I lied you can't breathe underwater BUT you CAN hold your breath a bit longer!

§a+20% Lung Capacity

bigger-jumps.title: Jolly Jumper
bigger-jumps.description:
§8You can jump higher.

§8Watch out for painful landings.

§a+50% Jump Height

elytra-expertise.title: Elytra Expertise
elytra-expertise.description:
§8Do a barrel roll!

§a+15% Elytra Turn Efficiency

§a+15% Elytra Rocket Efficiency

§a+15% Elytra Glide Efficiency
